info.title: HashDit API
info.description: HashDit threat intelligence API for domain security analysis, blockchain address classification, address security assessment, transaction simulation, transaction security, token security, and Solana token security

post.description: Checks a given domain or URL for potential security risks using HashDit threat intelligence. The API analyzes the provided URL and returns a risk level along with detailed indicators.

risk_detail.name: is_in_wlist
risk_detail.value: The dApp is relatively safe based on the threat intelligence.

risk_detail.name: is_in_blist
risk_detail.value: There are potential risks in the dApp based on the threat intelligence.

post.description: Classifies a blockchain address by type and behavior. The API identifies whether an address is an externally owned account (EOA) or contract, determines contract characteristics (e.g. proxy patterns), and provides verification and token standard metadata.

Performs an in-depth security analysis of a blockchain address. The API evaluates contract behavior, privilege controls, rug pull indicators, market signals, code security practices, transparency, and threat intelligence to produce an overall risk assessment.

Simulates one or more EVM transactions without broadcasting them on-chain. The API evaluates token balance changes, approvals, ownership transfers, and address-level security risks to help detect malicious or unexpected behavior before execution.

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Your HashDit API key (required for production use)

post.description: Performs a comprehensive security assessment of a Solana token. The API analyzes mint authority, freeze authority, transfer restrictions, holder concentration, market liquidity, administrative privileges, and threat intelligence to determine the token's overall risk profile.

requestBody.description: Solana token mint address to analyze

post.description: Performs a comprehensive security and market analysis of an EVM-compatible token (e.g. ERC-20). The API evaluates contract privileges, minting capabilities, honeypot risks, ownership controls, market liquidity, holder distribution, transfer restrictions, and threat intelligence to determine the token's overall risk profile.

Analyzes a blockchain transaction before / after execution to identify security risks. The API inspects transaction calldata, detects dangerous patterns (e.g. unlimited approvals), evaluates dApp and domain reputation, and returns an overall risk score with detailed explanations. This endpoint is designed for wallets, signing flows, and transaction confirmation screens.

parameters.name: X-DITING-API-DEBUG
parameters.description: Optional debug flag (1 enables verbose analysis)

risk_details.name: is_in_blist
risk_details.description: There are potential risks in the dApp based on the threat intelligence.

url.description: The full domain or URL to be analyzed.

has_result.description: Indicates whether the analysis result is immediately available.

polling_interval.description: Polling interval in seconds if results are not immediately available.

risk_level.description: Risk severity score (0-5). Higher values indicate higher risk.

risk_detail.description: Detailed list of detected risk indicators.

enum: The dApp is relatively safe based on the threat intelligence.
There are potential risks in the dApp based on the threat intelligence.

chainId.description: Blockchain chain ID. Example: 1 for Ethereum

address.description: Fully qualified address with chain prefix.

is_erc20.description: Indicates whether the contract follows the ERC-20 standard (1 = yes).

scanned_time.description: Unix timestamp when the address was last analyzed.

status.description: HTTP-style status code for the classification result.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the last time when the result was updated.

verify_status.description: Verification status of the contract (e.g. verified).

is_verified.description: Whether the contract source code is verified.

proxy_impl_address.description: Implementation contract address if the contract is a proxy.

proxy_impl_type.description: Token or contract standard of the proxy implementation.

chainId.description: Blockchain chain ID. Example: 56 for BNB Smart Chain.

address.description: Fully qualified address with chain prefix.

overall_score.description: Overall security score (0-100). Lower values indicate higher risk.

scanned_time.description: Unix timestamp of the latest scan.

low_activity.description: Indicates whether the address shows low on-chain activity.

newly_deployed.description: Indicates whether the contract was recently deployed.

overpowered_function.description: Presence of privileged or dangerous functions.

is_honeypot.description: Whether the contract behaves as a honeypot.

risk_level.description: Threat intelligence risk score. 3 is the highest risk level.

trust_level.description: Trust confidence level. 3 is the highest trust level.

chain_id.description: Blockchain chain ID. Example: 56 for BNB Smart Chain.

block_height.description: Block height used as the simulation context.

evm_transactions.description: List of EVM transactions to simulate.

request_source.description: Identifier for the request source (e.g. application name).

value.description: Native token value. Measured in wei.

gas_limit.description: Gas limit for the simulated transaction.

gas_price.description: Gas price for the simulation. Measured in wei

force.description: Forces simulation even if pre-checks fail.

involved_address_risks.description: Include risk scores for involved addresses.

risk_level.description: Risk severity level. Higher values indicate higher risk. -1 indicates unknown risk.

score.description: Trust score. Higher values indicate higher trust. -1 indicates unknown score.

effective_gas_price.description: Gas price applied during simulation. Measured in wei

balance_changes.description: Token balance changes by address (if requested).

token_address.description: Smart contract address of the token.

change_list.description: List of balance changes for different addresses.

address.description: Fully qualified Solana token mint address.

overall_score.description: Security score (0100). Lower values indicate higher risk.

scanned_time.description: Unix timestamp of the latest scan.

price.description: Current token price in USD(if available).

is_mintable.description: Determines whether new tokens can be minted.

is_risky.description: Indicates if mint authority poses risks.

is_freezable.description: Indicates whether token transfers can be frozen.

is_risky.description: Indicates if freeze authority poses risks.

top1_concentration.description: Percentage of supply held by top 1 holder. E.g. 0.2231 means 22.31%

top5_concentration.description: Percentage of supply held by top 5 holders. E.g. 0.4445 means 44.45%

top10_concentration.description: Percentage of supply held by top 10 holders. E.g. 0.4908 means 49.08%

chainId.description: Blockchain chain ID (e.g. 56 for BNB Smart Chain).

address.description: Fully qualified token address with chain prefix.

overall_score.description: Overall security score (0100). Lower values indicate higher risk.

scanned_time.description: Unix timestamp of the latest scan.

is_mintable.description: Indicates whether new tokens can be minted.

is_in_dex.description: Token is listed on a DEX.

is_honeypot.description: Indicates honeypot behaviour. A honeypot is a type of malicious smart contract designed to lure users into interacting with it under false pretenses. It appears to allow certain profitable actions (like buying or withdrawing tokens), but when users try to perform other actions (such as selling or transferring tokens), they are blocked or lose their funds.

hidden_owner.description: Ownership obfuscation detection. Hidden owner means the identity of the owner (or priviledged addresses) is not easily identifiable, in order to deceive users.

self_destruct.description: Contract self-destruct capability. A self-destruct feature allows the contract owner to permanently delete the contract and its associated funds, rendering it permanently inactive.

unlimited_mintable.description: Unlimited minting capability. An unlimited minting feature allows the contract owner to mint an unlimited number of tokens, regardless of the total supply.

owner_token_percent.description: Percentage of tokens owned by the contract owner. E.g. 0.17 means 17%

top1_eoa_concentration.description: Percentage of supply held by top 1 EOA holder. E.g. 0.17 means 17%

top5_eoa_concentration.description: Percentage of supply held by top 5 EOA holders. E.g. 0.17 means 17%

sell_tax.description: The amount of percentage tax charged when selling tokens. E.g. 0.01 means 1%

buy_tax.description: The amount of percentage tax charged when buying tokens. E.g. 0.01 means 1%

transfer_tax.description: The amount of percentage tax charged when transferring tokens. E.g. 0.01 means 1%

is_anti_whale.description: Indicates whether anti-whale restrictions are in place. Anti-whale restrictions are designed to prevent large holders from dominating the market and manipulating prices.

transfer_pausable.description: Indicates whether a privileged address can pause token transfers.

transfer_blacklist.description: Indicates whether a privileged address can blacklist other addresses from transferring tokens.

chainId.description: Blockchain chain ID (e.g. 56 for BNB Smart Chain).

to.description: Target contract address or recipient address.

value.description: Native token value. Measured in wei.

dappUrl.description: Originating dApp URL for domain risk analysis.

to.description: Target contract address or recipient address.

value.description: Native token value. Measured in wei.

overall_risk.description: Overall risk score (0-5). Higher values indicate higher risk.

url.description: dApp URL used for domain analysis (if provided).

risk.description: Risk severity score (0-5). Higher values indicate higher risk.
